prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Guitar, Drums, Brass, Bass, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Drums, Brass, and Bass, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Guitar, Drums, Brass, and Bass, omitting Pipe.

Style 3:
This composition is Piano, Guitar, Drums, Brass, Bass, Pipe-less.
